<p data-anchor-id="cb26">其中<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -767.2581232551549 1906 1034.5162465103099" style="width: 4.429ex; height: 2.429ex; vertical-align: -0.714ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-3BC"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-28" x="603" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-64" x="993" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-29" x="1516" y="0"></use></g></svg></span>为莫比乌斯函数[1]，定义如下</p>
<div class="md-section-divider"></div>

<p data-anchor-id="oyvo"><em>莫比乌斯函数的定义式<a href="#fn:2" id="fnref:2" title="查看注脚" class="footnote">[2]</a></em></p>

<h2 data-anchor-id="9486" id="莫比乌斯函数的性质">莫比乌斯函数的性质</h2>
<div class="md-section-divider"></div>
<h3 id="section" class="unnumbered" data-anchor-id="qbb8">(1)</h3>
<p data-anchor-id="22n3">当n不等于1时，n所有因子的莫比乌斯函数值的和为0，\</p>
<p data-anchor-id="8bg8">设<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span></p><div class="MathJax_SVG_Display" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="text-align: center;"><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -967.2581232551549 6980.222222222223 2408.996134478044" style="width: 16.143ex; height: 5.571ex; vertical-align: -3.429ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-46"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-28" x="749" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-6E" x="1139" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-29" x="1739" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-3D" x="2406" y="0"></use><g transform="translate(3463,0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJSZ2-2211"></use><g transform="translate(226,-1149)"><use transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-64"></use><use transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-7C" x="523" y="0"></use><use transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-6E" x="802" y="0"></use></g></g><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-3BC" x="5074" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-28" x="5677" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-64" x="6067" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-29" x="6590" y="0"></use></g></svg></span></div><p></p>

<div class="md-section-divider"></div>
<h3 id="section-1" class="unnumbered" data-anchor-id="0x3l">(2)</h3>

<p data-anchor-id="xdmi">积性函数的性质\</p>
<p data-anchor-id="71ug"><span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -767.2581232551549 3664.5555555555557 1034.5162465103099" style="width: 8.571ex; height: 2.429ex; vertical-align: -0.714ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-66"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-28" x="550" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-31" x="940" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-29" x="1440" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-3D" x="2107" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-31" x="3164" y="0"></use></g></svg></span>\</p>
<p data-anchor-id="50x5">积性函数的前缀和也是积性函数\ <br>
\</p>
<p data-anchor-id="hf2d">因为积性函数是积性函数,</p>
<p data-anchor-id="pyfr">因此可以通过线性筛求出莫比乌斯函数的值</p>
<pre data-anchor-id="39s1"><code class="hljs prolog">mu[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]=<span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
for(i=<span class="hljs-number">2</span>;i&lt;=n;i++){
    if(!not_prime[i]){
        prime[++tot]=i;
        mu[i]=<span class="hljs-number">-1</span>;
    }
    for(j=<span class="hljs-number">1</span>;prime[j]*i&lt;=n;j++){
        not_prime[prime[j]*i]=<span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
        if(i<span class="hljs-comment">%prime[j]==0){</span>
            mu[prime[j]*i]=<span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
            break;
        }
        mu[prime[j]*i]=-mu[i];
    }
}
</code></pre>
<div class="md-section-divider"></div>
<h3 data-anchor-id="d72o" id="例题1">例题1:</h3>
<p data-anchor-id="ivwn"><a href="http://www.lydsy.com/JudgeOnline/problem.php?id=2440" target="_blank">BZOJ 2440 <br>
完全平方数</a>\</p>
<p data-anchor-id="yxrh"><span>题目大意</span>：求第k个无平方因子数<a href="#fn:3" id="fnref:3" title="查看注脚" class="footnote">[3]</a>\</p>
<p data-anchor-id="m1vr">做法： <br>
首先二分答案，问题转化为求<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -767.2581232551549 2075.166666666667 1034.5162465103099" style="width: 4.857ex; height: 2.429ex; vertical-align: -0.714ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-5B"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-31" x="278" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-2C" x="779" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-78" x="1224" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-5D" x="1796" y="0"></use></g></svg></span>之间有多少个无平方因子数\ <br>
根据容斥原理可知，对于<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -767.2581232551549 3094.5 1034.5162465103099" style="width: 7.143ex; height: 2.429ex; vertical-align: -0.714ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-73"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-71" x="469" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-72" x="930" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-74" x="1381" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-28" x="1743" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-78" x="2132" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-29" x="2705" y="0"></use></g></svg></span>之内所有的质数， <br>
答案G(x)=0个质数平方倍数的个数-1个质数平方倍数的个数+2个质数平方倍数的个数-...， <br>
那么对于偶数个质数平方对于答案的贡献就是正的，否则是负的，\ <br>
如果不是若干个互异质数的乘积，那么对答案没有影响，</p>
<p data-anchor-id="6yks">如何表示这个式子呢?\</p>
<p data-anchor-id="kf4i">观察莫比乌斯函数的定义[1]，可以知道对于能对答案产生贡献的数<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -459.258123255155 572.5 487.51624651031" style="width: 1.286ex; height: 1.143ex; vertical-align: -0.143ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-78"></use></g></svg></span>，<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -870.5893361798055 5815.811741944341 1137.8474594349605" style="width: 13.571ex; height: 2.571ex; vertical-align: -0.714ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-3BC"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-28" x="603" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-78" x="993" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-29" x="1565" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-3D" x="2232" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-28" x="3289" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-2212" x="3678" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-31" x="4457" y="0"></use><g transform="translate(4957,0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-29"></use><use transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-6B" x="550" y="513"></use></g></g></svg></span>，其中<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -711.2581232551549 521.5 739.51624651031" style="width: 1.143ex; height: 1.714ex; vertical-align: -0.143ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-6B"></use></g></svg></span>为<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -459.258123255155 572.5 487.51624651031" style="width: 1.286ex; height: 1.143ex; vertical-align: -0.143ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-78"></use></g></svg></span>分解得到质数的个数 <br>
根据上述说明，那么可以得知结果\</p>
<div class="md-section-divider"></div>
<p data-anchor-id="xo7y"><span class="MathJax_Preview"></span></p><div class="MathJax_SVG_Display" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="text-align: center;"><span class="MathJax_SVG" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-78" x="173" y="676"></use><g transform="translate(60,-755)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-230B" x="8593" y="0"></use></g></svg></span></div><p></p>
<pre data-anchor-id="kx4n"><code class="hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-meta">#<span class="hljs-meta-keyword">include</span><span class="hljs-meta-string">&lt;iostream&gt;</span></span>
<span class="hljs-meta">#<span class="hljs-meta-keyword">include</span><span class="hljs-meta-string">&lt;cstdio&gt;</span></span>
<span class="hljs-meta">#<span class="hljs-meta-keyword">include</span><span class="hljs-meta-string">&lt;cmath&gt;</span></span>
<span class="hljs-meta">#<span class="hljs-meta-keyword">define</span> N 100005</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">using</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">namespace</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">std</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">bool</span> not_prime[N];
<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> prime[N];
<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> mu[N];
<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> tot;

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">Mu</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> n)</span></span>{
    <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> i,j;
    mu[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]=<span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span>(i=<span class="hljs-number">2</span>;i&lt;=n;i++){
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span>(!not_prime[i]){
            prime[++tot]=i;
            mu[i]=<span class="hljs-number">-1</span>;
        }
        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span>(j=<span class="hljs-number">1</span>;prime[j]*i&lt;=n;j++){
            not_prime[prime[j]*i]=<span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
            <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span>(i%prime[j]==<span class="hljs-number">0</span>){
                mu[prime[j]*i]=<span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
                <span class="hljs-keyword">break</span>;
            }
            mu[prime[j]*i]=-mu[i];
        }
    }
}    
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">can</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> x)</span></span>{
    <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> sum=<span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> s=<span class="hljs-built_in">floor</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">sqrt</span>(x));
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span>(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> i=<span class="hljs-number">1</span>;i&lt;=s;++i)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span>(mu[i])
           sum+=mu[i]*<span class="hljs-built_in">floor</span>(x/(i*i));
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> sum;
}

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">main</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span></span>{
    Mu(N);<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> T,sum;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">scanf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"%d"</span>,&amp;T);
    <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span>(T--){
        <span class="hljs-built_in">scanf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"%d"</span>,&amp;num);
        <span class="hljs-keyword">long</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">long</span> l=<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,r=num&lt;&lt;<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,mid;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span>(l&lt;r){
            mid=(l+r)&gt;&gt;<span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
            <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span>(can(mid)&lt;num)
                l=mid+<span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
            <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> r=mid;
        }
        <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"%lld\n"</span>,r);
    }
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
}
</code></pre>

xlink:href="#MJMATHI-6E" x="60" y="-686"></use></g><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-29" x="15311" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-46" x="15701" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-28" x="16451" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-64" x="16840" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-29" x="17364" y="0"></use></g></svg></span></div><p></p>
<p data-anchor-id="dzds">证明同理，一般要用到的都是这种形式</p>
<div class="md-section-divider"></div>
<h2 data-anchor-id="81ab" id="莫比乌斯反演的应用">莫比乌斯反演的应用</h2>
<p data-anchor-id="l87g">对于一些函数<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -767.2581232551549 1930 1034.5162465103099" style="width: 4.429ex; height: 2.429ex; vertical-align: -0.714ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-66"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-28" x="550" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-6E" x="940" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-29" x="1540" y="0"></use></g></svg></span>,如果我们很难直接求出它的值，而容易求出倍数和或约数和<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -767.2581232551549 2129 1034.5162465103099" style="width: 5ex; height: 2.429ex; vertical-align: -0.714ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-46"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-28" x="749" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-6E" x="1139" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-29" x="1739" y="0"></use></g></svg></span>, <br>
那么我们可以直接利用莫比乌斯反演来求得<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -767.2581232551549 1930 1034.5162465103099" style="width: 4.429ex; height: 2.429ex; vertical-align: -0.714ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-66"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-28" x="550" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-6E" x="940" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-29" x="1540" y="0"></use></g></svg></span>的值</p>
<div class="md-section-divider"></div>
<h4 data-anchor-id="9hs5" id="例">例:</h4>
<p data-anchor-id="lha1">f(n)表示某一范围内(x,y)=n的数对的数量，\ <br>
F(n)表示某一范围内n|(x,y)的数对的数量\ <br>
那么直接求f(n)并不是很好求，而F(n)求起来相对无脑一些，\ <br>
那么我们可以通过对F(n)进行莫比乌斯 反演来求得f(n)\</p>
<div class="md-section-divider"></div>
<h3 data-anchor-id="c5yn" id="例题2">例题2:</h3>
<p data-anchor-id="c28z"><a href="http://www.lydsy.com/JudgeOnline/problem.php?id=2301" target="_blank">BZOJ 2301 Problem <br>
b</a></p>

transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-6B"></use><use transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-3BC" x="1611" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-28" x="2214" y="0"></use><g xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-46" x="3877" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-28" x="4626" y="0"></use><use transform="translate(0,-6235)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJSZ2-2211"></use><g transform="translate(254,-1149)"><use transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" width="643" height="60" x="0" y="220"></rect><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-64" x="60" y="676"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" <p data-anchor-id="grjt">分析可知这个算法的复杂度是<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -767.2581232551549 2158 1034.5162465103099" style="width: 5ex; height: 2.429ex; vertical-align: -0.714ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-398"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-28" x="778" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-6E" x="1168" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-29" x="1768" y="0"></use></g></svg></span></p>
<p data-anchor-id="xmi3">我们还需要对这个算法进行进一步优化</p>
<p data-anchor-id="s8un">因为<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -768.2581232551549 1623.413040638277 1209.0605983137268" style="width: 3.714ex; height: 2.857ex; vertical-align: -1.143ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-230A"></use><g transform="translate(564,0)"><rect stroke="none" width="494" height="60" x="0" y="220"></rect><use transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-61" x="84" y="612"></use><use transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-64" x="87" y="-590"></use></g><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-230B" x="1178" y="0"></use></g></svg></span>至多只有<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -806.6273375408692 1863.5 1094.5162465103099" style="width: 4.286ex; height: 2.571ex; vertical-align: -0.714ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-32"></use><g transform="translate(500,0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-221A" x="0" y="-71"></use><rect stroke="none" width="529" height="60" x="833" y="670"></rect><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-61" x="833" y="0"></use></g></g></svg></span>个取值，</p>
<p data-anchor-id="mil8">那么<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -941.5095818397583 3242.5834405894348 1382.3120568983302" style="width: 7.571ex; height: 3.143ex; vertical-align: -1.143ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-230A"></use><g transform="translate(564,0)"><rect stroke="none" width="494" height="60" x="0" y="220"></rect><use transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-61" x="84" y="612"></use><use transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-64" x="87" y="-590"></use></g><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-230B" x="1178" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-230A" x="1623" y="0"></use><g transform="translate(2187,0)"><rect stroke="none" width="490" height="60" x="0" y="220"></rect><use transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-62" x="131" y="613"></use><use transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-64" x="84" y="-590"></use></g><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-230B" x="2798" y="0"></use></g></svg></span>至多只有<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -932.6273375408692 5128.444444444444 1220.5162465103099" style="width: 11.857ex; height: 2.857ex; vertical-align: -0.714ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-32"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-28" x="500" y="0"></use><g transform="translate(890,0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-221A" x="0" y="-71"></use><rect stroke="none" width="529" height="60" x="833" y="670"></rect><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-61" x="833" y="0"></use></g><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-2B" x="2475" y="0"></use><g transform="translate(3475,0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-221A" x="0" y="55"></use><rect stroke="none" width="429" height="60" x="833" y="796"></rect><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-62" x="833" y="0"></use></g><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-29" x="4738" y="0"></use></g></svg></span>个取值</p>
<p data-anchor-id="zggc">因为使得<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -941.5095818397583 5700.6389961449895 1382.3120568983302" style="width: 13.286ex; height: 3.143ex; vertical-align: -1.143ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-230A"></use><g transform="translate(564,0)"><rect stroke="none" width="494" height="60" x="0" y="220"></rect><use transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-61" x="84" y="612"></use><use transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-64" x="87" y="-590"></use></g><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-230B" x="1178" y="0"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-230A" x="1623" y="0"></use><g transform="translate(2187,0)"><rect stroke="none" width="490" height="60" x="0" y="220"></rect><use transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-62" x="131" y="613"></use><use transform="scale(0.7071067811865476)" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-64" x="84" y="-590"></use></g><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-230B" x="2798" y="0"></use><g transform="translate(3520,0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-3D"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-3D" x="778" y="0"></use></g><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-69" x="5355" y="0"></use></g></svg></span>成立的<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -678.2581232551549 345.5 706.51624651031" style="width: 0.857ex; height: 1.571ex; vertical-align: -0.143ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-69"></use></g></svg></span>值都是连续的，</p>
<p data-anchor-id="sckj">所以可以维护一个莫比乌斯函数的前缀和，</p>
<p data-anchor-id="wtal">这样就可以在<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -807.1273375408692 2991.5 1094.5162465103099" style="width: 7ex; height: 2.571ex; vertical-align: -0.714ex; margin: 1px 0px;"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-398"></use><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-28" x="778" y="0"></use><g transform="translate(1168,0)"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-221A" x="0" y="-71"></use><rect stroke="none" width="600" height="60" x="833" y="670"></rect><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMATHI-6E" x="833" y="0"></use></g><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#MJMAIN-29" x="2602" y="0"></use></g></svg></span>的时间内出解</p>
<p data-anchor-id="ufhh">枚举除法的取值在莫比乌斯反演的应用当中非常常用</p>
<pre data-anchor-id="nz38"><code class="hljs lisp">if(<span class="hljs-name">a&gt;b</span>)swap(<span class="hljs-name">a</span>,b)<span class="hljs-comment">;</span>
for(<span class="hljs-name">i=1</span><span class="hljs-comment">;i&lt;=a;i=last+1){</span>
    last=min(<span class="hljs-name">a/</span>(<span class="hljs-name">a/i</span>),b/(<span class="hljs-name">b/i</span>))<span class="hljs-comment">;</span>
    re+=(<span class="hljs-name">a/i</span>)*(a/i)*(<span class="hljs-name">sum</span>[last]-sum[i-1])<span class="hljs-comment">;</span>
}
return re<span class="hljs-comment">;</span>
</code></pre>
<p data-anchor-id="osld">代码异常好写</p>
<pre data-anchor-id="eg3l"><code class="hljs cpp"><span class="hljs-meta">#<span class="hljs-meta-keyword">include</span><span class="hljs-meta-string">&lt;iostream&gt;</span></span>
<span class="hljs-meta">#<span class="hljs-meta-keyword">include</span><span class="hljs-meta-string">&lt;cstdio&gt;</span></span>
<span class="hljs-meta">#<span class="hljs-meta-keyword">include</span><span class="hljs-meta-string">&lt;cmath&gt;</span></span>
<span class="hljs-meta">#<span class="hljs-meta-keyword">define</span> N 50005</span>
<span class="hljs-meta">#<span class="hljs-meta-keyword">define</span> inf 0x7fffffff</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">using</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">namespace</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">std</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">bool</span> not_prime[N];
<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> prime[N];
<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> sum[N];
<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> mu[N];
<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> tot;

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">void</span> <span class="hljs-title">Mu</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> n)</span></span>{
    <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> i,j;
    mu[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]=<span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span>(i=<span class="hljs-number">2</span>;i&lt;=n;i++){
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span>(!not_prime[i]){
            prime[++tot]=i;
            mu[i]=<span class="hljs-number">-1</span>;
        }
        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span>(j=<span class="hljs-number">1</span>;prime[j]*i&lt;=n;j++){
            not_prime[prime[j]*i]=<span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
            <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span>(i%prime[j]==<span class="hljs-number">0</span>){
                mu[prime[j]*i]=<span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
                <span class="hljs-keyword">break</span>;
            }
            mu[prime[j]*i]=-mu[i];
        }
    }
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span>(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> i=<span class="hljs-number">1</span>;i&lt;=n;++i)
        sum[i]=sum[i<span class="hljs-number">-1</span>]+mu[i];
}    
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">ans</span><span class="hljs-params">(<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> n,<span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> m)</span></span>{
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span>(n&gt;m)swap(n,m);
    <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> last,i,re=<span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span>(i=<span class="hljs-number">1</span>;i&lt;=n;i=last+<span class="hljs-number">1</span>){
        last=min(n/(n/i),m/(m/i));
        re+=(n/i)*(m/i)*(sum[last]-sum[i<span class="hljs-number">-1</span>]);
    }   
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> re;
}

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> <span class="hljs-title">main</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span></span>{
    Mu(N);
    <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> T;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> a,b,c,d,k;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">scanf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"%d"</span>,&amp;T);
    <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span>(T--){
        <span class="hljs-built_in">scanf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"%d%d%d%d%d"</span>,&amp;a,&amp;b,&amp;c,&amp;d,&amp;k);
        a--;c--;
        a/=k;b/=k;c/=k;d/=k;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">int</span> Ans=ans(b,d)-ans(a,d)-ans(b,c)+ans(a,c);
        <span class="hljs-built_in">printf</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"%d\n"</span>,Ans);
    }
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
}
</code></pre>
<p data-anchor-id="10p3">BZOJ 10s但是luogu却莫名WA\ <br>
全部加上long long 之后总算是过了\ <br>
百思不得其解</p>

<h3 data-anchor-id="buvk" id="例题3">例题3</h3>
<p data-anchor-id="wxrc"><a href="http://www.lydsy.com/JudgeOnline/problem.php?id=2820" target="_blank">BZOJ 2820 <br>
YY的GCD</a>\ <br>
题目大意：求有多少数对<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 -767.2581232551549 2294.166666666667 1034.5162465103099" style="width: 5.286ex;
